extracted_playbook.title: Update Spectrum Power 7
extracted_playbook.description: Update Spectrum Power 7 to V24Q3 or later version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are you an operator of critical power systems (e.g., TSOs or DSOs)?

extracted_playbook.title: Check Resilient Protection Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that appropriate resilient protection measures are in place for critical power systems to minimize the risk of cyber incidents impacting grid reliability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the provided security updates using the corresponding tooling and documented procedures. Validate updates before applying and supervise the update process with trained staff.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access with appropriate mechanisms such as firewalls, segmentation, and VPNs.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Environment According to Siemens Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines to run devices in a protected IT environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet. Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
